description: This file defines a Python module that sets up and configures an AI-powered answer engine agent called Sage. It includes imports, path setup, storage configuration, and a function get_sage() that creates and returns an Agent instance with integrated tools for web search, deep analysis, and file management. The code also contains detailed docstrings explaining the agent's behavior and usage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model, tools, and behavior settings.

methods.name: get_sage
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of the Sage answer engine agent with specific tools and configurations.
